error.title: Something went wrong.
error.description: Your sign in request failed. Please try again.
error.devicesLimitExceeded: You can only use up to two accounts on this device. Please log in with one of your previous accounts.

success.title: Check your email
success.description: We sent you a login link. Be sure to check your spam too.

styleTransfer.failed: Video generation failed. Please try again.
styleTransfer.durationInfo: Original video: {{original}}s, will use first {{selected}}s for generation
styleTransfer.trimFailedUsingOriginal: Video trimming failed, using original video
styleTransfer.processedFirstSeconds: Video will be processed using first {{duration}}s only
styleTransfer.timeout: Video generation timed out after 10 minutes
styleTransfer.processingFailed: Video processing failed, will use original file
styleTransfer.styleTransferFailed: Style transfer failed. Please try again.
styleTransfer.invalidStyleResponse: Invalid response from style transfer API
styleTransfer.videoGenerationFailed: Video generation failed. Please try again.
styleTransfer.videoGenerationTimeout: Video generation timed out after 10 minutes
styleTransfer.noPredictionId: No prediction ID received from video generation API
styleTransfer.unexpectedOutputFormat: Unexpected output format from video generation
styleTransfer.noVideoUrlFound: No video URL found in generation output
styleTransfer.missingVideoOrFrame: Missing video or styled frame for generation
styleTransfer.uploadVideoFirst: Please upload a video first to extract the first frame
styleTransfer.referenceImageCropped: Reference image automatically cropped to match frame dimensions
styleTransfer.autoCropFailed: Auto-cropping failed, using original image. Please ensure your reference matches the frame composition.
styleTransfer.frameExtractionAllRetries: Failed to extract frame from video after all retries
styleTransfer.safariTimeoutAdvice: Safari timeout detected. Try using a shorter video or a different browser like Chrome for better video processing.
styleTransfer.safariVideoTooLong: Video is longer than 15 seconds. Please trim your video to 15 seconds or use Chrome browser for auto-trimming.
styleTransfer.safariDurationCheckFailed: Failed to check video duration. Please try again.
styleTransfer.promptTooShort: Prompt must be at least 3 characters long

creation.characterLimitExceeded: You've hit the limit! Upgrade your plan to create more characters.

common.rateLimitExceeded: You've hit the limit! Upgrade your plan to generate more at once.
common.invalidImage: Please select a valid image file
common.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete account.Please contact support.

info.processingLargeFile: Processing large file ({{size}}MB)... This may take a while.
info.uploadingLargeVideo: Uploading large video directly to avoid processing issues...
info.compressingLargeVideo: Compressing large video to fit upload limits...
info.largeVideoWarning: Large video file detected ({{size}}MB). Processing may take longer.
info.smartCompressing: Smart compressing video with audio preservation...
info.compressionComplete: Video compressed successfully! Size reduced by {{ratio}}%

backgroundRemoval.purchaseZaps: Please purchase more zaps to use the Background Remover

error.generateComicFailed: Failed to generate comic, please try again.
error.noImageError: Let's start by creating a few images to move forward
error.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload images or videos only.
error.videoGenerationFailed: Video generation failed. Try switching to another model, adjusting your prompt, or using different input media. Some models may block sensitive content.
error.humanModeVideoGenerationFailed: V2V Human Video model couldn't process this input. Try another model, or use a video with the person facing the camera.
error.noFace: No face found. Please use a video with a front-facing person, or switch to V2V General.
error.smallFace: Face too small to process. Please move closer to the camera or use a video with a larger face.
error.videoGenerationServerFailed: Oops! Something went wrong. Try using the V2V General model instead.
error.imageGenerationFailed: Oops! Image generation failed. You can try a different model or tweak your prompt—some models may block sensitive content.
error.sensitiveContent: Generation failed: The input or output was flagged as sensitive. Please try again with different inputs.
error.imageExportFailed: Failed to export image. Please try again.
error.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload images or videos only.
error.failedToProcessFile: Failed to process file. Please try again.
error.failedToPost: Failed to post. Please try again.
error.someImagesGenerationFailed: Some images generation failed. Please try again.
error.videoTooLarge: Video file too large ({{size}}MB). Maximum size is {{max}}MB.
error.imageTooLarge: Image file too large ({{size}}MB). Maximum size is {{max}}MB.
error.imageIsLargerThan5MB: Oops! That image is too big. Try uploading one under 5MB.
error.memoryError: File too large for processing. Please try a smaller file.
error.timeoutError: Upload timeout. Please check your connection and try again with a smaller file.
error.uploadError: Upload failed. Please check your connection and try again.
error.chunkError: Large file upload failed. Please try again or use a smaller file.
error.emailDomainNotAllowed: Please use a popular email provider such as Gmail, Outlook, or Yahoo to register.
error.generationFailed: Couldn’t generate this time. Try changing your input or switching to a different model — some models may block certain content.
error.emailDomainNotAllowedForGmail: Please don’t include dots (.) or plus signs (+) in your Gmail address.
error.illegalContent: Do not post illegal content, including anything involving minors. Violations will result in a permanent ban.
error.imageProcessingFailed: Failed to process image. Please try again.
error.userBlocked: Your account has been banned for violating our community policy. If you believe this is a mistake, please submit an appeal in our Discord #tickets channel.
error.multipleReferenceImages: Free users can add only one reference image. Upgrade now to add multiple!
error.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported format. Please upload images only
error.uploadEndFrameFailed: Failed to upload end frame image
error.nsfwContentNotSupported: To keep things safe and consistent, NSFW content must be generated directly on KomikoAI. Manual uploads of NSFW content aren’t supported.

success.shareLinkCopied: Content copied to clipboard! Share it with your friends now!
